and p.place_type_id = 12
and p.place_type_id in (14, 15, 28, 38)
and p.place_type_id = 32
and p.place_type_id = 39
order by place_review desc
order by place_rating desc
order by bookmarked desc
) c ) where rnum between #{pi.start} and #{pi.end}
